# Age-based Catch Curve

Age-based Catch Curve

## Usage

``` r
CC(x, Data, reps = 100, plot = FALSE)
```

## Arguments

- x:

  Iteration number

- Data:

  An object of class `Data`

- reps:

  Number of reps

- plot:

  Logical. Show the plot?

## Value

A vector of length `reps` of samples of the negative slope of the
catch-curve (Z)

## Examples

``` r
CC(1, MSEtool::SimulatedData, plot=TRUE)

#>   [1] 0.6562446 0.6827363 0.6577228 0.6025702 0.5593875 0.4755739 0.6063444
```
